attributes.action: call a General Election so we can have a democratically elected (competent) Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown was like a child in the playground heading his gang whilst Tony Blair was heading his own.  He got his own way and sneaked in the back door and is hoping this economic dowbturn will allow him to cling on a bit longer.
He is unpopular and the country should have the right to show him how unpopular he is.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
